{"id":"2f6f9339-aa37-4b87-9b79-d95960717d22","messages":[{"prompt":"in AddressDetailsFom, when calling the following code 
selectedBuildingTypeId.getBuildingTypeConfig()
 .getFieldsConfig(
 viewState.isAreaRequired,
 viewState.renameAddressFields,
 viewState.isPhotoFieldEnabled,
 viewState.requiredFieldConfigs
 )
 .let { fields ->
 fields.forEachIndexed { index, it ->
 when (it.fieldType) {
 AddressDetailsFieldType.Text -> {
 TextField(
 selectedFieldValueMap,
 selectedBuildingTypeId,
 viewState,
 it,
 index == fields.indexOfLast { it.fieldType == AddressDetailsFieldType.Text },
 resources,
 actionSink
 )
 }

 AddressDetailsFieldType.Photo -> {
 PhotoField(
 addressDetailsField = it,
 addressPhotos = viewState.addressPhotos.values.toList(),
 actionSink = actionSink,
 resources = resources,
 maxPhotos = (5 - viewState.addressPhotos.values.size).takeIf { it > 0 }
 ?: 0
 )
 }

 }
 }
 }
 }
when the building type is an apparment there is an empty extra field showing with no title or hint, what can cause this ?","id":"3b3cb49d-85b6-4db5-a852-e7f0d07e1482","response":"## Analysis of Empty Field in Apartment Building Type

Looking at the code, the issue with an empty extra field showing for apartment building type could be caused by a few potential issues:

### Possible Causes

1. **Configuration Issue**: The apartment building type might have a field in its configuration that doesn't have proper title/hint resources.

2. **Field Type Mismatch**: A field might be defined in the configuration but its type might not be properly handled in the UI.

3. **Empty Field in Configuration**: There might be an empty field entry in the apartment configuration.

### Evidence from the Code

From `BuildingTypeConfigTest.kt`, we can see:

```kotlin
@Test
fun get_fields_config_apartment_rename_true() {
 val config = BuildingTypeConfig.Apartment
 val fields = config.getFieldsConfig(isAreaRequired = true, renameAddressFields = true,
 isPhotoFieldEnabled = false)
 assertEquals(8, fields.size) // Apartment has 8 fields
 // ...
}
```

This shows that the apartment building type has 8 fields, which is more than other building types (villa has 5, office has 7).

### Solution

Check the field configuration for apartment building type in `BuildingTypeConfig.kt`. The issue is likely in the default field configuration for apartments.

You should:

1. Verify all fields in the apartment configuration have proper title and hint resources
2. Check if there's an empty or misconfigured field in the apartment configuration
3. Ensure all field types are properly handled in the UI

The most likely issue is that one of the fields in the apartment configuration doesn't have proper string resources assigned, causing it to render as an empty field in the UI.

To fix this, you'll need to update the field configuration for apartments in the `defaultFieldConfig` map to ensure all fields have proper title and hint resources.","referencedFilePaths":["/Users/ahmed.elshaer/Developer/global-experiences/android/global-locations-shared/src/test/java/com/careem/globalexp/locationfinder/BuildingTypeConfigTest.kt","/Users/ahmed.elshaer/Developer/global-experiences/android/global-locations-shared/src/test/java/com/careem/globalexp/locationfinder/ValidationUtilsTest.kt","/Users/ahmed.elshaer/Developer/global-experiences/android/global-locations-shared/src/commonMain/kotlin/com/careem/globalexp/locations/addressdetails/AddressDetailsReducer.kt","/Users/ahmed.elshaer/Developer/global-experiences/android/global-locations-shared/src/commonMain/kotlin/com/careem/globalexp/locations/addressdetails/state/BuildingType.kt","/Users/ahmed.elshaer/Developer/global-experiences/android/global-locations/src/commonMain/kotlin/com/careem/globalexp/locations/addressdetails/ui/AddressDetailsForm.kt"],"imageFilePath":null,"webSearchIncluded":false,"documentationDetails":null,"personaName":"Rubber Duck"}],"clientCode":"codegpt.chat.completion","model":"claude-3-opus-20240229","createdOn":[2025,2,25,23,42,40,366758000],"updatedOn":[2025,2,25,23,51,19,660439000],"discardTokenLimit":false}
